sampling_demo.description: Demonstrates MCP LLM sampling capabilities - tools can request text generation from the LLM during execution for AI-powered analysis, code generation, sentiment analysis, creative writing, multi-turn conversations, and agentic research workflows. Includes 7 example tools showing basic sampling (summarize, sentiment analysis, code generation, creative writing) and advanced patterns (multi-turn conversations, research workflows, translation chains).
sampling_demo.author: Atlas UI Team
sampling_demo.short_description: LLM sampling demonstration with 7 example tools
